tai5-uan5 tsa2-ki5 tsoo2-sian penn5-poo-tsok8 e5 hun-in hong-siok8, u7 tsit8 e5 「khan-tshiu2」gi5-sik; tsa-boo2 gin2-a2 tua7-han3 liau2-au7, tsa-poo e5 lai5 in tau gua7-khau2 tuann5-khim5, tshiunn3-kua piau2 sim-i3, tsa-boo2 gin2-a2 na7 kah-i3, siang-hong tioh8 khan-tshiu2 seh8 tsng sia7 tsit8 lian3, tu5-liau2 po3 tshin-tsiann5 ping5-iu2 tsai, koh u7 「hu-tshe siong lang5 tshiu2-khan-tshiu2, hoo7-siong hu5-tshi5 ke3 it-sing」e5 i3-su3, tse si7 ho5-ting2 tsong-giam5 sin5-sing3 e5 gi5-sik, han3-jin5 khuann3 liau2 tsin him-sian7, tse tsiu7-si7 「khan-tshiu2」tsit ku3 ue7 e5 iu5-lai5, lang5 kong2:「gi2-gian5 si7 bun5-hua3 e5 uah8 hua3-tsioh8」
